build.buildCommand: echo 'Installing dependencies...' && YARN_ENABLE_IMMUTABLE_INSTALLS=false yarn install && echo 'Building shared package (prebuild only)...' && cd packages/shared && node prebuild.js && echo 'Checking shared output...' && ls -la dist && cd ../../packages/server/api && echo 'Building API package...' && yarn build || { echo 'API package build failed!'; exit 1; } && echo 'Build completed successfully.'
